faq.question: How long does it take to set up?
faq.answer: Most customers are up and running within 15 minutes. Our onboarding team will guide you through the entire process.

faq.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees.

faq.question: Do you offer data migration services?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide free data migration for all Professional and Enterprise plans. Our team will handle the entire process for you.

faq.question: Is my data secure?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level security with 256-bit SSL encryption and are SOC 2 Type II compliant. Your data is always protected.

faq.question: What integrations do you support?
faq.answer: We support over 100+ integrations including Slack, Salesforce, HubSpot, Zapier, and many more. Custom integrations are available for Enterprise plans.
